title: Our NBA cheat sheet for 2026: Big questions, awards picks and All-NBA rosters
content: Here are the biggest storylines you missed in the first half of the 2025-26 regular season, and what to watch in the New Year.

title: Ravens say Lamar's status against Steelers TBD
content: Ravens coach John Harbaugh said Monday that "it's to be determined" whether quarterback Lamar Jackson can play in Sunday night's game at the Steelers.

title: Riley blames Notre Dame for ending USC rivalry
content: USC coach Lincoln Riley said Notre Dame failed to follow through on its pledge to play the Trojans "anytime, anywhere."

title: Baylor defends signing ex-NBA pick amid criticism
content: Baylor coach Scott Drew defended his signing of former NBA draft pick James Nnaji, saying he's merely adapting to the current climate of college basketball.

title: Stefanski mum on future, 'privileged' to have job
content: Amid speculation about his job security in Cleveland, Kevin Stefanski declined to get into specifics about the future but said he was "privileged to have this job" when asked if he wishes to continue beyond this season as the Browns' head coach.

title: Freeman returning to ND in '26 amid NFL interest
content: Notre Dame head coach Marcus Freeman has agreed to a restructured deal and, despite being linked to NFL coaching jobs, will return to the Irish in 2026, according to ESPN and multiple reports.

title: Sources: Auburn WR Coleman plans to join portal
content: Auburn star wide receiver Cam Coleman plans to enter the transfer portal, sources confirmed to ESPN. A former five-star recruit, Coleman is the fourth Tigers wide receiver who has opted to move on after a coaching change.

title: üèà 26 QBs to watch in CFB transfer portal
content: From top targets to top backups, we've tiered QBs ahead of the transfer portal officially opening Jan. 2.

title: Can Texas Tech billionaire booster Cody Campbell fix college sports?
content: Texas Tech's billionaire booster has turned the Red Raiders into a powerhouse. Can he fix college sports next?

title: Are the Falcons to thank for the Rams' future success?
content: Thanks to a trade with Atlanta in the last draft, Los Angeles has options when it comes to its future.

title: A Falcons iron man: Jake Matthews chases dad's historic streak
content: Atlanta's left tackle will make his 193rd consecutive start on MNF -- 36 behind his Hall of Fame father, Bruce.

title: How all 17 weeks of the NFL season led us here: Barnwell sorts what mattered and what didn't
content: Bill Barnwell picked out what most impacted the NFL playoff hunt across the entire season, from the Lions' dud in Week 1 to the Steelers' struggles Sunday.

title: Biggest upcoming tests for the six undefeated teams
content: When could Arizona, Michigan, Iowa State, Vanderbilt, Nebraska or Miami (Ohio) suffer their first loss?

title: Carrying logs and 5 a.m. workouts: How Curt Cignetti made his first team a winner
content: After winning a title as an assistant with Alabama, Cignetti's first head-coaching job had a lower profile.

title: The number that will decide 2026 for all 15 American League teams
content: We did the NL. Now it's time to dive into the stats that could make -- or break -- each AL club in the new year.

content: For the first time ever, a USWNT player isn't in the top 20 of ESPN FC Women's Rank, our list of the top 50 players in the world. Why?

content: The 50 best women's soccer players in the world, ranked by an expert panel of coaches, GMs and journalists.

content: The Winter Classic and Stadium Series will cross Florida off the list. Here are our ideas on the next set.

title: Free agent pickups: Look to Saints, Titans amid Week 18 uncertainty
content: All the free agent options worth adding as we dive into Week 18, the final week of the fantasy football season.

title: Tyler Shough for Rookie of Year? The Saints' QB is making his case
content: Sunday's win marked the fifth for the New Orleans signal-caller in just his eighth game as a starter.

title: Two vulnerable NFL sack records: Tracking pace for Myles Garrett (22!), Broncos' D (64!)
content: The Browns' vet edge rusher and Denver's defense have one week to rewrite the single-season sacks record book.

title: Keep, dump or extend: What transfers should Man United make in January?
content: The January transfer window opens this week, and big clubs like Man United have plenty of big decisions to make -- including with Ruben Amorim himself.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Fulham want USMNT striker Pepi
content: Fulham are interested in signing USMNT and PSV Eindhoven striker Ricardo Pepi. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: Predicting the UFC champions 365 days from now
content: Look back at the year in UFC championships and forward to who could hold the titles at this time next year.

title: Early Week 18 bets: Ravens-Steelers to be a slugfest; Drake Maye for MVP
content: Which lines offered value once odds came out? Here are games we are eyeing for bets going into Week 18.

title: 'Thank you Browns': Ravens give shoutout to rival for saving season
content: Baltimore now controls its division fate after Cleveland stunned Pittsburgh -- and the Ravens made sure to say thanks.

title: Pickups: Add Anthony Black, Cedric Coward before it's too late
content: Every week in fantasy basketball, there are available players who can help fill holes in your roster. Here are the ones to add for the week ahead.

title: NLL Week 5 highlights: Black Bears score 16 in big win over Wings
content: Get caught up on all of the weekend's action, which also included a thrilling 10-9 win for Saskatchewan over Halifax.

title: "Will Knock The Hell Out ": Trump Threatens Iran Over Nuclear Enrichment
content: President Donald Trump warned Iran against reconstituting its nuclear program Monday as he welcomed Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu to his home in Florida for wide-ranging talks.

title: Trump Says US Hit Docking Area For Alleged Venezuela Drug Boats
content: Donald Trump said Monday the United States had hit and destroyed a docking area for alleged Venezuela drug-running boats -- in what could amount to the first land strike of the military campaign to counter narcotics trafficking from Latin America.

title: Trump Says He Was "Very Angry" Over Alleged Ukraine Attack On Putin Residence
content: US President Donald Trump on Monday said Russian President Vladimir Putin told him Ukraine tried to attack Putin's residence in northern Russia, which Kyiv has denied.

title: "On Humanitarian Grounds": Karnataka To Rehouse Families Hit By Bengaluru Demolition Drive
content: The Karnataka government on Monday decided to provide alternate housing to those "genuine" homeless whose illegally constructed houses or sheds were demolished by authorities at Kogilu in the northern part of Bengaluru during a demolition drive.

title: Russia Claims Ukraine Fired Drones At Putin's Home, "Lies," Says Zelensky
content: Russia's foreign minister, Sergei Lavrov, on Monday alleged that Ukraine carried out a drone attack overnight on President Vladimir Putin's residence between Moscow and Saint Petersburg.

title: Explained: Is Peace In Ukraine Any Closer After Trump-Zelensky Talks?
content: US President Donald Trump met his Ukrainian counterpart Volodymyr Zelenskiy on Sunday and said the two were "maybe very close" to a deal to end the war with Russia.

title: Keys Next Year? Delhi Moves to Repair Long-Abandoned Flats For Poor
content: After lying vacant for over a decade, thousands of Economically Weaker Section (EWS) flats in Delhi may finally see residents move in. The Delhi government has started repair work at one of the capital's largest EWS housing clusters.

title: 'Israel Might Not Exist Without Netanyahu As PM': Trump's Big Praise
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu arrived in Florida for a meeting with Donald Trump on Monday, with the US president pushing to move to the next stage of his fragile Gaza truce plan.

title: Vaishno Devi Pilgrimage Sees Dip Over Security Concerns, Bad Weather
content: The pilgrim footfall at the Mata Vaishno Devi shrine atop Trikuta hills in Reasi district of Jammu and Kashmir fell below the 70-lakh mark in 2025, marking a significant decline.

title: Hours After Party With Friends, Flight Attendant Dies In Gurugram
content: A flight attendant who was visiting a friend in DLF Phase 1, died after experiencing difficulty in breathing, police said on Monday.

title: Man Arrested For Abusive Online Post Against Bengali Actor After Messi Chaos
content: The police have arrested a man from Bihar for allegedly posting abusive and obscene comments on social media targeting Bengali actress Shubhashree Ganguly, following Argentine football star Lionel Messi's recent visit to Kolkata, an officer said.

title: "Politically Motivated": Imran Khan, Bushra Bibi Challenge 17-Year Jail Term
content: PTI founder and former prime minister Imran Khan and his wife Bushra Bibi on Monday filed separate appeals before the Islamabad High Court (IHC), challenging their conviction in the Toshakhana 2 case.

title: India Successfully Tests 120-Km Range Pinaka Rocket In Odisha
content: The maiden flight test of Pinaka Long Range Guided Rocket (LRGR 120) was conducted successfully at the Integrated Test Range in Odisha's Chandipur on Monday.

title: "Air India Managed, Only IndiGo Failed": Shashi Tharoor On Airline's Crisis
content: Congress MP Shashi Tharoor on Monday criticised Indigo Airlines over the recent flight disruptions, stating that the airline must be held accountable for its failure to meet operational responsibilities.

title: Hamas Confirms Military Spokesperson's Death. Israel Said So In August
content: Hamas's armed wing confirmed on Monday the death of its spokesperson, Abu Obeida, months after Israel announced he had been killed in an air strike in Gaza.

title: "Want Government To Stop This": Father Of Tripura Student Killed In Uttarakhand
content: "No one should lose their child the way I did. No child who has gone outside to study should face this": This was the message from Tarun Chakma, the father of the man from Tripura who was killed in a racial attack in Dehradun.

title: JDS MLA HD Revanna Discharged In Sexual Harassment Case
content: A court here on Monday discharged senior JD(S) MLA and former minister HD Revanna from a sexual harassment case registered in 2024.

title: 4 Dead, 9 Injured After Mumbai's BEST Bus Crashes Into Pedestrians
content: Four people were killed after they were hit by a BEST bus while it was reversing in Mumbai tonight. Nine others were injured. The incident happened in Mumbai's Bhandup.

title: Mumbai Civic Body Polls: BJP To Contest 137 Seats, Shiv Sena 90
content: Ruling allies BJP and Eknath Shinde-led Shiv Sena will contest 137 and 90 seats, respectively, in the Brihanmumbai Municipal Corporation polls.

title: Drunk Cab Driver Rams Dozen Vehicles In Gurugram, Arrested
content: Police here detained a cab driver, who allegedly caused widespread panic near Sector 4 market area after he struck more than a dozen vehicles, police said.

title: First land strike? US hits drug boat loading facility in Venezuela; tensions set to rise
content: President Trump revealed a US operation targeting a drug loading area in Venezuela, marking a potential escalation in land-based actions.  He described a "major explosion" hitting boats and the implementation site.  Details remain scarce, with US agencies and the Venezuelan government declining comment, fueling speculation about covert activities amid a significant Caribbean military buildup.

title: ‚ÄòIsrael would not exist today without Netanyahu‚Äô: Trump praises Israeli PM at Mar-a-Lago
content: US President Donald Trump stated that Israel would not exist today without Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, praising his leadership during a meeting. Trump also warned Iran against rebuilding nuclear facilities. Netanyahu reciprocated the praise, calling Trump an unparalleled friend to Israel and the free world.

title: Handshake row deepens; PCB chief Mohsin Naqvi warns of 'equal terms'
content: PCB chairman Mohsin Naqvi said Pakistan will not force handshakes with India if the Indian team is unwilling, ahead of the T20 World Cup 2026. He stressed keeping politics out of cricket and demanded equal treatment. The issue has continued since the Pahalgam attack, causing repeated handshake refusals, controversies, ICC interventions and sanctions during recent India-Pakistan tournaments.

title: Nvidia gives an update on the deal seen as ‚Å†a major financial lifeline for Intel
content: Nvidia has invested $5 billion in Intel, acquiring a significant stake. This strategic partnership aims to bolster Intel's struggling market position by leveraging its manufacturing capabilities for custom x86 CPUs and PC chips.  The deal signifies a crucial step in Intel's turnaround, offering much-needed capital and industry validation.

title: 2-year high: Industrial output growth surges; at 6.7% in Nov
content: Industrial output surged to a 25-month high in November, driven by a strong rebound in manufacturing and mining sectors. Consumer durables and non-durables also showed robust expansion, signaling a positive consumption scenario. Capital goods output also maintained healthy momentum, indicating sustained investment activity.

title: 'I solved 8 wars, how about India and Pakistan': Trump meets Netanyahu; repeats claims on hot mic
content: US President Donald Trump again claimed he resolved the India-Pakistan conflict, stating he mediated an "immediate" ceasefire. However, India maintains the cessation of hostilities was a result of direct military talks, with Prime Minister Modi clarifying no foreign leader requested India to halt its operations.

title: ‚ÄòAI agents are becoming a problem‚Äô: OpenAI CEO flags risks; offers $555K role
content: OpenAI is hiring a high-paid Head of Preparedness amid growing fears of AI systems exploiting security flaws and harming mental well-being. CEO Sam Altman acknowledged models are finding critical vulnerabilities, while also highlighting AI's potential psychological impact. The role will tackle cybersecurity, biosecurity, and self-improving AI risks, a crucial step as AI's dual nature becomes apparent.

title: Chinese billionaire‚Äôs plan: Gaming tycoon fathered 100 children
content: Chinese billionaire Xu Bo reportedly aims to father at least 20 US-born children via surrogacy to inherit his $1.1 billion gaming fortune. While his company denies claims of over 100 children, they confirmed 12 were born in the US. This trend echoes similar desires from figures like Pavel Durov and Elon Musk to expand their legacies.

title: No war in Pawar 'parivar': From split to civic poll pact - the NCP saga explained
content: The Ajit Pawar-led NCP and the Sharad Pawar faction will contest local elections in Pimpri-Chinchwad and Pune together. This alliance is a local arrangement for the civic polls. The decision was made after consulting party workers. This development has raised questions within the Maha Vikas Aghadi alliance.

title: Mumbai: 4 killed, 10 injured as BEST bus hits passengers; driver detained
content: A reversing BEST bus tragically struck pedestrians on Station Road in Bhandup (West) late Monday night, resulting in at least four fatalities and ten injuries. Emergency services responded swiftly, transporting the injured to local hospitals. The exact cause of the devastating accident is currently under investigation.

title: Travis Kelce admits he let Andy Reid down amid Chiefs‚Äô tough season
content: Kansas City Chiefs fans experienced an unfamiliar season of losses and missed playoffs in 2025, a stark contrast to years of dominance.  Veteran Travis Kelce expressed deep disappointment, feeling he let down coach Andy Reid, highlighting their strong bond and his unwavering sense of responsibility to the team and his mentor.

title: Tim Dillon questions Erika Kirk‚Äôs public appearances after Charlie Kirk tragedy
content: Tim Dillon questioned Erika Kirk‚Äôs public appearances after reports about Charlie Kirk, saying people feel confused. On his podcast, he discussed her merch events and her interview with Nicki Minaj at America Fest. Erika Kirk defended her actions, continued leading Turning Point USA, and reassured Minaj during their on-stage conversation.

title: MLB trade rumors: Mets eye $10M Phillies star; Brandon Nimmo in focus
content: The New York Mets are reportedly signing veteran outfielder Max Kepler to a one-year deal, aiming for a cost-effective solution after trading Brandon Nimmo. Kepler offers defensive reliability and left-handed power, fitting the Mets' strategy of maintaining roster stability and payroll flexibility while preparing for top prospect Carson Benge's eventual rise.

title: Cargo ship or warship? China's sinister Taiwan war plan revealed - see pics
content: China is transforming its cargo ship, Zhongda 79, into an arsenal ship, equipping it with containerized launchers for up to 60 missiles. This upgrade, featuring advanced weaponry including hypersonic missiles, signifies Beijing's push to bolster its naval capabilities and match the US Navy's vertical launch systems. The vessel's transformation highlights China's growing maritime ambitions.

title: Who is Nick Shirley? YouTuber behind viral Minnesota daycare fraud probe
content: Nick Shirley is a YouTuber whose video alleging daycare fraud in Minnesota went viral on December 26. He claims some centers received millions despite appearing inactive. His video drew attention from Congressman Tom Emmer, who questioned Governor Tim Walz. All claims against YouTuber remain allegations, with no official response yet.

title: Ayesha Curry says she felt 'disrespected' by women pursuing Stephen Curry
content: Stephen Curry's wife, Ayesha Curry, has often gotten brutally trolled for some of her controversial comments. Amid this, the popular entrepreneur opened up about her insecurities as women have tried to pursue the Golden State Warriors' star player, Stephen Curry, even though he has been married for fourteen years now. Ayesha Curry talks about what she felt and how she navigates through this complicated journey.

title: 'We're worried': What SC said on convict Sengar's bail; the 'public servant' question
content: The Supreme Court has intervened in the Unnao rape case. It has halted the Delhi high court's decision to suspend former BJP leader Kuldeep Singh Sengar's life sentence. The apex court is examining if an MLA qualifies as a public servant under the POCSO Act. This move ensures Sengar remains in jail. The survivor welcomes the Supreme Court's action.

title: Scientists found more than 16,000 dinosaur footprints underwater in Bolivia
content: A remarkable discovery in Bolivia's Torotoro National Park has revealed over 16,000 dinosaur footprints. These ancient tracks, dating back 68 million years, show dinosaurs moving along a prehistoric lake's edge. Researchers believe some dinosaurs may have even waded or swum in shallow waters. This site offers unique insights into dinosaur behaviour and their interaction with aquatic environments.

title: AI is not therapy: Microsoft AI CEO defends use; says chatbots can spread kindness
content: Microsoft AI CEO Mustafa Suleyman observes a growing trend of users confiding personal issues, like relationship troubles, in AI chatbots, finding them non-judgmental and supportive. While acknowledging potential dependency risks, he believes these tools can foster kindness.

title: A dead man's archive: What the Epstein files unleashed in 2025
content: What was meant to close the book instead exposed how deeply Epstein‚Äôs world had been protected, how many powerful people passed through it, and how difficult it is to tell the truth once secrecy has been institutionalised.

title: Kaun Banega Crorepati 17: Kumar Birla recalls his father's tough condition
content: Kumar Mangalam Birla revealed on Kaun Banega Crorepati that his father, Aditya Vikram Birla, mandated he become a Chartered Accountant before joining the family business. Despite his initial desire to pursue an MBA, Birla ultimately complied with his father's strict rule, even after seeking help from his grandfather and mother.

title: Watch: Carlsen loses cool; slams table again after loss to India‚Äôs Erigaisi
content: World No. 1 Magnus Carlsen slammed the table after losing on time to India‚Äôs Arjun Erigaisi at the World Blitz Championship in Doha. The ninth-round defeat, with Arjun playing black, was one of the tournament‚Äôs biggest upsets and pushed him joint top on 7.5 points. It was Carlsen‚Äôs latest emotional outburst.

title: The Designer of the Year Award goes to... AI
content: That moment reshaped the industry. If neural networks could see, what else could they learn? The answer, as Jensen Huang would later discover, was nearly everything.

title: When should you sell a stock? How to remove emotions from investment - explained
content: Selling stocks will never become effortless. There will always be some doubt, some second-guessing. That‚Äôs normal. The goal is not to get every sell decision perfectly right. The goal is to avoid selling good businesses for bad reasons.

title: Who was Erica Fox? Missing swimmer identified after body found off California coast
content: A body found near Davenport Beach has been identified as missing swimmer Erica Fox, 55. She vanished on December 21 while swimming near Lovers Point in Pacific Grove. Family confirmed her identity after the recovery on December 27. Authorities continue to investigate, following reports of a shark sighting at the time she disappeared.

title: Aravalli, stray dogs & fireworks: 2025 was a year of flip flops in SC
content: The Supreme Court has witnessed a concerning trend of overturning its own recent orders, including those on the Aravali controversy, stray dogs, and firecrackers. This judicial flip-flopping, noted by the court itself, risks undermining its credibility and public confidence. The trend suggests decisions may be made hastily, prioritizing judges over established legal principles.

title: Kishan, Pant or Jurel: Who will be KL Rahul‚Äôs backup for NZ ODIs
content: With KL Rahul set to be India‚Äôs first-choice wicketkeeper, the battle for his backup has intensified ahead of the New Zealand ODIs. Ishan Kishan‚Äôs red-hot domestic form, Rishabh Pant‚Äôs experience and Dhruv Jurel‚Äôs consistency have turned the second wicketkeeper‚Äôs slot into a key selection dilemma as India fine-tune their white-ball plans

title: Missiles & loiter munition: Centre clears mega Rs 79K cr defence deal; what's on list
content: The Defence Acquisition Council has approved capital acquisition proposals totaling approximately Rs 79,000 crore to enhance the operational capabilities of the Armed Forces. These approvals, granted on December 29, 2025, cover a variety of equipment for the Army, Navy, and Air Force, including loiter munition systems, radars, guided rocket ammunition, and drone detection systems.

title: ‚ÄòMy hero‚Äô: Bryce Dunlap‚Äôs liver donation sparks rare Browns captain moment
content: The Cleveland Browns honored Kimberly Dunlap Kane as Dawg Pound Captain before their Week 17 game against the Steelers. Her son, Bryce Dunlap, donated his liver to Browns legend Bernie Kosar in a life-saving transplant. Kosar shared an emotional message as Cleveland centered its final home game around gratitude, organ donation, and Bryce‚Äôs legacy.

title: Protect your heart during winter with 5 simple daily habits
content: Winter's chill silently strains your heart.  Cold weather constricts blood vessels, raises blood pressure, and thickens blood, increasing cardiac workload.  Combined with reduced activity and unhealthy eating habits, this season poses a significant risk.  Simple daily practices like staying active, keeping warm, eating well, staying hydrated, and maintaining a consistent sleep schedule can effectively protect your cardiovascular health.

title: Horrific car accident: Anthony Joshua hospitalised; all you need to know
content: Former world heavyweight champion Anthony Joshua was injured in a car accident in Nigeria that killed two other passengers. The crash, confirmed by Lagos officials, occurred on a busy road linking Ogun State and Lagos. Joshua was taken to an undisclosed hospital, with no details yet on his injuries. The accident comes just days after his win over Jake Paul in Miami, as he prepares for a potential title return and a possible fight with Tyson Fury in 2026.

title: Live-fire war games: China launches drills around Taiwan; Taipei mobilises forces
content: China launched large-scale live-fire military drills around Taiwan, deploying warships and aircraft in a stern warning to independence supporters and foreign powers. Taiwan's military is on high alert, vowing to defend its democracy amid drills aimed at blockading key ports and simulating strikes.

title: 'Abysmal record': India flays Pak over attacks on minorities; refutes charges
content: Ministry of external affairs has rejected Pakistan's accusations of attacks on minorities, labeling them as "finger pointing" and highlighting Pakistan's "abysmal record" on the issue. The MEA stated that Pakistan's "horrific and systemic victimisation of minorities" is a well-established fact, refuting claims made by Pakistan's foreign affairs spokesperson.

title: Quote of the day by Arianna Huffington: We need to accept we won‚Äôt‚Ä¶
content: Arianna Huffington, a prominent thought leader, advocates for a redefined understanding of success, health, and leadership. She emphasizes that failure is not the opposite of success but an integral part of the journey, fostering resilience and wisdom. Her insights encourage embracing human limitations and learning from mistakes for comprehensive growth and progress.

title: 'Da Niners': 49ers' virtual jabs at Bears lead NFL trolls
content: San Francisco 49ers beat the Chicago Bears 42-38 in a high-scoring "Sunday Night Football" matchup . quarterback Brock Purdy had 303 passing yards and accounted for five touchdowns . 49ers will face the Seattle Seahawks in week 18 for the NFC's no. 1 seed . the 49ers put a 49ers jersey on a Build-A-Bear .

title: NFL futures: Rams still Super Bowl favorites; 49ers close gap
content: Through 17 weeks of the NFL season, the  Los Angeles Rams  are the favorite to win the Super Bowl at +475. Right behind them are the  Seattle Seahawks  at +500. The  Denver Broncos  have the third-best odds to win the Super Bowl at +750. They are followed by the  New England Patriots  at +900. The  San Francisco 49ers  are next at +950 following their wild victory Sunday night. The Seahawks and 49ers meet in Week 18. Note: Odds by  DraftKings Sportsbook  and subject to change.

title: Aston Villa's 11th straight win might be the most impressive. Plus: Inter must sharpen up
content: Aston Villa beat Chelsea 2-1 in the premier league on saturday . it was a battle of top four teams after which aston villa might legitimately be entering the title race alongside arsenal and manchester city . however, they're going to need to sharpen up if they want to run away with the Scudetto .

title: Winners and losers: Maye, Henry shine in fantasy finals; Gibbs, Lamb disappoint
content: the 2025 fantasy football season is championship week in most leagues . it featured standout performances by Drake Maye , Derrick Henry and Chase Brown . the fantasy stars included jahmyr Gibbs , Josh Jacobs and ceeDee Lamb .

content: the INDIANA HOOSIERS are having a historic run this college football season . they went 13-0 in the regular season, staking their claim as the only undefeated team headed into the College Football Playoff . the Hoosiers will take on the Alabama Crimson Tide in this year's Rose Bowl on New Year's Day .

title: 'Not much': IndiGo pilots on allowance hike; raise effective Jan 1
content: The comtempt petitions referred to relaxations allegedly granted in October 2025 to multiple carriers, including Air India, InterGlobe Aviation that operates IndiGo and SpiceJet.

title: 'My legacy is on the line': What Giannis' return means for the Bucks -- and the NBA
content: GIANNIS ANTETOKOUNMPO took a hard dribble and delivered a windmill dunk to punctuate a 112-103 victory . the Milwaukee Bucks had gone 2-6 in his three-week absence . his actions on the court have always been where he has spoken loudest .

title: Reid plans to return as Chiefs coach next season
content: the Chiefs coach says he plans to return next season . "if they'll have me back, I'll come back," he tells local reporters . he's less familiar with facing those questions in the final days of December .

title: Ex-boxing champ Joshua hurt in crash, two killed
content: a two-time heavyweight champion was traveling in the back of a Lexus SUV . the vehicle was involved in a collision around 11 a.m. local time . two other passengers in the vehicle lost their lives at the scene .

title: One stat that will make or break 2026 for all 15 NL teams
content: we're going to pick one stat from the 2025 season for each MLB team . we'll start with the national league and then return with the American League . 17 different pitchers recorded a save for the Diamondbacks .

title: Indore police questions migrant workers on allegations of being Bangladeshi; documents being verified
content: According to the police, a complaint was received at the Malharganj police station from some residents of Kamla Nagar area alleging that a group of workers at a cloth factory were illegal Bangladeshi immigrants

title: Day after Dr. Abdullah opposed students‚Äô protest, NC legislator says ‚Äòshould have been allowed‚Äô
content: Sadiq‚Äôs statement came as a U-turn on the stand taken by Dr. Abdullah, who questioned the intention of the leaders who wanted to join protests in Srinagar

title: Amit Shah to visit West Bengal for three days ahead of 2026 polls
content: Between December 29 and December 31, Mr Shah is also expected to chair several meetings with the State unit of the BJP and review the party‚Äôs roadmap and preparedness for the upcoming elections

title: Congress suspends Aravalli agitation in Rajasthan after SC decision
content: Pradesh Congress Committee president Govind Singh Dotasra said the Supreme Court‚Äôs order depicted respect for people‚Äôs voice and was a ‚Äúdecisive blow to the mining mafia‚Äù operating in the Aravalli hills

title: About 170 sheep mysteriously die in Lucknow, police sends samples for testing
content: Prima facie, it is not clear whether these sheep died after consuming waste material or some unknown person had allegedly given poison to them

content: Leader of Opposition¬†Suvendu¬†Adhikari asked for an FIR to be filed against the Trinamool MLA¬†who stopped the hearing in¬†Chinsurah¬†over this issue

title: Indian naval sailing vessel Kaundinya sails on maiden overseas voyage to Oman
content: The Navy informed that the historic expedition marks a significant milestone in India‚Äôs endeavour to revive, understand and celebrate its ancient maritime heritage through a living ocean voyage

title: BJP-Shiv Sena seat-sharing deal: Allies finalise 137-90 formula; joint BMC campaign next
content:
Mumbai: After a week of hard negotiations, BJP-Shiv Sena finalised a 137-90 seat-sharing formula. Till late Monday, Sena functionaries said there was a dispute over 14 seats and said they had put the onus on BJP as the big party in the alliance to take 'everyone' along. Political observers said after a week of parlays, deputy CM Eknath Shinde had held sway and got BJP to agree to a 'respectable' figure. "Our talks are over. We will now campaign jointly and make sure Mahayuti's mayor is anointed in BMC. Smaller allies will be given tickets by us from our quota," said Mumbai BJP chief MLA Ameet Satam. Sena's Rahul Shewale said talks were positive and a good seat-sharing formula was finalised. Earlier on Monday, BJP had distributed AB forms to candidates without declaring any official list. Till Monday evening, Sena too had not released any official list of candidates but it gave out AB forms to some aspirants to file nominations on Tuesday.

End of Article
